total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows that are filled with 5s and 0s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that are filled with only 0s in the input grid.
Q3: Replace the 0s that are between 5s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q4: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s, but only if they are surrounded by rows filled with 2s.
Q5: Generate the output grid by applying the changes from Q3 and Q4 to the input grid.

Q5: Replace the 0s at the end of the rows identified in Q1 with 1s, but only if they are surrounded by rows filled with 2s.
